alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 02 at 3:41PM AKST until March 05 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Plan on difficult travel with near blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches, are possible. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through late Friday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause near blizzard conditions at times and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
